data.eml:eml: Synonymy of Reikosiella Yoshimoto under Merostenus Walker (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea: Eupelmidae), with a checklist of world species and a revision of those species with brachypterous females

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gibson, Gary A. P. (2017): Synonymy of Reikosiella Yoshimoto under Merostenus Walker (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea: Eupelmidae), with a checklist of world species and a revision of those species with brachypterous females. Zootaxa 4255 (1): 1-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.556479
